title: RIOT CHANGE YOU'RE FCKING LOOT SYSTEM BACK I'VE HAD ENOUGH OF THIS BS!!

replies.body: I love getting a value of 720 BE from a champion capsule, I love that I can trade a 960 BE worth shard with two Level 6 Tokens instead of using the shard to exchange and buy champs :)
